## StorageObserver interface

An observer that wraps any errors in `FirebaseStorageError`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StorageObserver<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [complete](./storage.storageobserver.complete.md) | [CompleteFn](./storage.completefn.md) | A function that is called if the event stream ends normally. |
|  [error](./storage.storageobserver.error.md) | [ErrorFn](./storage.errorfn.md) | A function that is called with a <code>FirebaseStorageError</code> if the event stream ends due to an error. |
|  [next](./storage.storageobserver.next.md) | [NextFn](./storage.nextfn.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | Function that is called once for each value in the event stream. |
